successes.title: The Menstrual Cup, Reinvented | Lily Cup Compact
successes.description: A reusable menstrual cup that collapses into a case for easy carrying. It does the job of 1625 tampons; better for you and the planet.

Pledges.description: BIG THANK YOU! Your help at any level will help start the menstrual cup revolution, and support reducing disposable tampon and pad waste. We'll keep you updated with exclusive news and special offers.

EARLY BIRD – One Lily Cup Compact with protective case AND you'll keep 1625 tampons out of landfill! You can choose your cup size (A or B) at the end of the campaign.
(Estimated Retail Price $40)
FREE shipping worldwide.

One Lily Cup Compact with protective case AND you'll keep 1625 tampons out of landfill! You can choose your cup size (A or B) at the end of the campaign.
(Estimated Retail Price $40)
FREE shipping worldwide.

PERIOD PICK-ME-UP – One Lily Cup Compact with protective case + one Triple Action Feminine Wash + three Monthly Spa Tablet bath bombs made especially for period time. AND you'll keep 1625 tampons out of landfill! You can choose your cup size (A or B) at the end of the campaign.
(Estimated Retail Price $65)
FREE shipping worldwide.

DOUBLE (C)UP - Two Lily Cup Compacts with protective cases. If you give one cup to a friend, it will keep 3250 tampons out of landfill! You can choose any combination of sizes (A or B) at the end of the campaign.
(Estimated Retail Price $80)
FREE shipping worldwide.

DOUBLE (C)UP - Two Lily Cup Compacts with protective cases (regular price). If you give one cup to a friend, it will keep 3250 tampons out of landfill! You can choose any combination of sizes (A or B) at the end of the campaign.
(Estimated Retail Price $80)
FREE shipping worldwide.

MIX (C)UP - 1 Lily Cup Compact with protective case + 1 Lily Cup 'Classic'. Get both style of Lily Cups! You can choose any combination of sizes (A or B) at the end of the campaign.
(Estimated Retail Price $80)
FREE shipping worldwide.

PERIOD PICK-ME-UP PLUS – One Lily Cup Compact with protective case + one Triple Action Feminine Wash + three Monthly Spa Tablet bath bombs made especially for period time. PLUS you’ll get one classic Lily Cup! If you give one cup to a friend, it will keep 3250 tampons out of landfill! You can choose your cup size (A or B) at the end of the campaign.
(Estimated Retail Price $104)
FREE shipping worldwide.

THE WORKS – Receive products from across the Intimina range. You'll get one Lily Cup Compact with one protective case + three Triple Action Feminine Washes + twelve Monthly Spa Tablet bath bombs + one classic Lily Cup + one Feminine Moisturizer + one Intimate Accessory Cleaner + Laselle Kegel Routine (3 x Kegel Exercise Balls). You can choose your cup size (A or B) at the end of the campaign.
(Estimated Retail Price $227)
FREE shipping worldwide.
